```{r}
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
data <- readxl::read_excel(here::here("data", "raw", "I2D-BIO_2022_103.xlsx"))
```

# Create Camtrap DP

## Create datapackage.json

```{r}

```

## Create deployments

```{r}
deployments <-
  data %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    deploymentID = NULL,
    locationID = NULL,
    locationName = NULL,
    latitude = NULL,
    longitude = NULL,
    coordinateUncertainty = NULL,
    deploymentStart = NULL,
    deploymentEnd = NULL,
    setupBy = NULL,
    deviveID = NULL,
    ddeviceModel = NULL,
    deviceDelay = NULL,
    deviceHeight = NULL,
    deviceDepth = NULL,
    deviceTilt = NULL,
    deviceHeading = NULL,
    dutyCycle = NULL,
    detectionDistance = NULL,
    timestampIssues = NULL,
    devicePlatform = NULL,
    baitUse = NULL,
    featureType = NULL,
    habitat = NULL,
    deploymentGroups = NULL,
    deploymentTags = NULL,
    deploymentComments = NULL
  )
```

## Create media

```{r}
media <-
  data %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    medidaID = NULL,
    deploymentID = NULL,
    captureMethod = NULL,
    timestamp = NULL,
    filePath = NULL,
    filePublic = NULL,
    fileName = NULL,
    fileMediatype = NULL,
    samplingFrequency = NULL,
    bitDepth = NULL,
    gain = NULL,
    channels = NULL,
    duration = NULL,
    exifData = NULL,
    favorite = NULL,
    mediaComments = NULL
  )
```
